title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? The output is "MySomeClass".
OB: When running the code on Tomcat 7.0.0 (built from svn r939221), the output is "MySomeAnn" instead of the expected output "MySomeClass". This is not in line with the Servlet 3.0 specification. However, the code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
